title: Ski
text: We will take one day skiing around the dolomites through 1200 kilometers of slopes surrounded by the dolomite's magnificent peaks.

title: Snowshoes
text: This year, we've added a new amazing experience: Snowshoes around the woods in the magnificent environment of Marmolada.

title: Wellness
text: Hosted by the QC Terme Dolomiti with private healthy dinner, you will stay without technology restoring your physical and spiritual balance.

title: Amazing traditional food
text: Enjoy 3 days of authentic italian mountain food, straight from ancient, simpler times.

title: Professional alpine guides
text: We will be joined by professional, licensed alpine guides and mountaineers.

title: Invite only
text: The event is invite-only and you will spend time with like-minded but diverse and extremely impressive people.
